allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add multi-platform support and enhanced command options

- Add platform detection and platform-specific briefs \(platforms.ts\)
- Add screen verification and coverage reporting \(verification.ts\)
- Add platform-specific design skills \(webapp, mobile, desktop\)
- Enhance analyze command with --verify and --useAssets options
- Add --platform and --skill options to flows, stylesheet, screens commands
- Add --force and --batch options to screens command
- Improve validation with detailed coverage reports
- Archive completed bug and feature plans

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
